title: Sophos Central Cloud - Events
description: This dashboard provides information about the Events generated by Sophos Central Cloud

definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard provides information about the Events generated by Sophos Central Cloud.

## Widgets
1. Total Events
2. Severity Over Time
3. Count of Critical Events
4. Count of High Events
5. Count of Medium Events
6. Count of Low Events
7. Distribution by Type
8. Distribution by Endpoint Type
9. Distribution by Endpoint and IP
10. Distribution by Group
11. Top 10 Sources
12. IPS Threat Details
13. Events by Country
14. Health Status
15. OS Details
16. Isolation and Lockdown Status
17. Log Details
